shortDescription.intro: Modified Tanimoto Similarity Index is a measure of similarity between two vectors.

fullDescription.p:
Fligner and Verducci proposed a modiﬁcation to the Tanimoto coeﬃcient that aims to remove the size bias inherent in the coeﬃcient.
Fligner, M.A.; Verducci, J.S.; Blower, P.E.; A Modification of the Jaccard-Tanimoto Similarity Index for Diverse Selection of Chemical Compounds Using Binary Strings, Technometrics, 2002, 44(2), 110-119
